page.title: 20 Questionnaire in Handsacre
page.content: A questionnaire was compiled by the top class of Hayes Meadow C.P. School. It was distributed to houses on the Tuppenhurst,Hill Top and Rookery Close Estates. 500 were circulated.196 were filled in and returned.Results were used in many of these pages.Children who wrote in were :Hilton V;Lee M;Richard H;Conrad F;Michelle R;Dale S; Brian C;Stuart S;Sammy B;Lee C;Simon W; Alexn I;Chris H;Lisa W;Rob B;Paul Aitken; Joanne P;Jon T;Rob P;Joanne W;Hayley W; Angela B;Fiona C;Amanda C;Emma H;Dawn H
